item.title: Post: VS Code pylint needs pylintrc
item.description: Visual Studio Code doesn’t seem to pick up my environment’s PYTHONPATH when running pylint. Makes project-local modules a headache. The solution: put it in your pylint config. ${workspaceFolder}/.pylintrc [MASTER] init-hook='import sys; sys.path.append("pylib")' Okay, I got more planned for today than messing with code. Back to that other stuff.
item.content:encoded:
Visual Studio Code doesn’t seem to pick up my environment’s PYTHONPATH when running pylint. Makes project-local modules a headache. The solution: put it in your pylint config.

${workspaceFolder}/.pylintrc

[MASTER]
init-hook='import sys; sys.path.append("pylib")'

Okay, I got more planned for today than messing with code. Back to that other stuff.
